title: What if Todd Haberkorn voiced Jhin

embed.description: I obtained some of Todd's voice files from Naruto Storm Revolution when he voiced Obito and added a custom voice filter to sound like Jhin.

body: Made a custom voice filter and applied it to Todd's Obito voice in a Naruto game. Let me know what you guys think of my sound design.

replies.body:
Riot picked the wrong voice actor! 

This is too perfect for him!!
As much as I love Jhin's actual voice (Quinton Flynn, Rumored) Todd would be far more epic and great for capturing Jhin's menacing side to his voice
